DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to use a randomized controlled design to determine the impact of a SMS messaging intervention on the following outcomes among persons diagnosed with diabetic retinopathy in rural China.
DOC.brief_title: a Trial of Using SMS Reminder Among Diabetic Retinopathy Patients in Rural China
DOC.detailed_description: SMS message reminder is a system which can sent re-visit information to remind the patient about the revisit time and address. The investigators can use the SMS system to find out if it is a useful to reduce the not-attended rate of the revisit appointment among the rural diabetic retinopathy patients.
DOC.criteria: all the diabetes patients who would like to join our study in 10 CREST cooperated rural hospitals. 1. Both the patient and his/her caretakers don't have cellphone,or the one who has cellphone but don't know how to use the SMS function. 2. The first revisit appointment time is outside our study period.
